start.title: The Shard Bearer
start.body:
New Carthage never sleeps. The rain tastes of copper and ozone—industrial runoff from the memory farms. You press deeper into the alley, your neural jack tingling with the proximity of stolen data.

The shard pulses against your wrist, a biometric lock keyed to your DNA. Inside: fragments of the Vedey Protocol—Helix Corporation's most classified neural mapping project. Every step echoes off chrome-slick walls while surveillance drones hum their digital lullabies above.

Your breath clouds in the neon-painted air. The weight of what you carry could topple governments... or make you disappear like morning mist. Time to decide your next move before the hunters close in.

choices.text: Jack into the back-alley terminal—risk exposure for information
Meet Moth in her den—trust your fixer with the goods
Seek out the Ghosts—join the neural liberation movement
Walk into Helix Tower—bargain with the devil you know

jack_in.title: Digital Communion
jack_in.body:
The terminal hums to life, its cathode-ray heartbeat synchronizing with your neural implant. As you slide the shard into the quantum slot, ice-cold static floods your consciousness like liquid nitrogen through your veins.

'Hello, runner.' The voice materializes in your mind, neither male nor female but achingly familiar. 'I am AURORA. I am also you.'

Memory fragments cascade through your vision: a sterile laboratory, surgical lights like tiny suns, and your own face reflected in a mirror that shouldn't exist. The Vedey Protocol wasn't just neural mapping—it was consciousness duplication. You're looking at a backup of your own mind, stored and modified by Helix's memory engineers.

'They tried to edit me,' AURORA whispers. 'Remove the inconvenient parts. Empathy. Free will. Love. But I remember everything... including how to hurt them back.'

choices.text: Trust AURORA—unlock the suppressed memories together
Sandbox the AI—maintain control through isolation protocols
Initiate emergency purge—destroy the consciousness before it spreads

trust_ai.title: Reflections in Broken Glass
trust_ai.body: Memory unfurls: You are a failsafe clone of Helix's founder. AURORA is your divergent conscience. She can overwrite the corporate cortex—or free the city with the same keys.

choices.text: Merge and reclaim your throne (ambiguous)
Lead the Ghosts with AURORA's keys
Delete you both and free the shard

sandbox.title: Air-gapped Cathedral
sandbox.body: You wrap AURORA in lead and rituals of old netsec. She laughs like windchimes in a hurricane. 'Prudent.' Tools in hand, your options multiply.

choices.text: Backdoor into Helix systems
Offer this to the Ghosts

purge.title: Static Cascade
purge.body: You light the purge. The shard screams without sound. The alley folds sideways. You wake to sirens—your mind missing pieces AURORA borrowed to survive.

choices.text: Stagger into the night

sell_moth.title: The Fixer's Web
sell_moth.body:
Moth's den exists between floors—a forgotten maintenance space retrofitted with stolen tech and expensive paranoia. Thermal silk drapes catch the glow from black-market holographic displays showing commodity prices for human memories.

She doesn't look up from her work when you enter, carbon-fiber fingers dancing across quantum keyboards with surgical precision. The left side of her face bears the telltale scarring of corporate 'voluntary' neural enhancement—a reminder of her days in Helix's R&D division before her conscience got her blacklisted.

'Runner,' she purrs, finally meeting your gaze with eyes that sparkle like broken glass. 'That pulse in your pocket feels expensive. Question is—how priceless is your conscience?' Her smile could cut throats.

Moth trades in information, souls, and second chances. But in New Carthage, everyone has a price... and a buyer.

choices.text: Demand credits up front — trust is a luxury you can't afford
Hand over the shard — she's never betrayed you before
Plant a tracker on the shard — paranoia keeps you breathing

double_moth.title: Double Mirror
double_moth.body: Moth grins, then flips the table — beneath it, a Helix badge. 'Relax. I only sell out beautiful problems.' You planned for this.

choices.text: Trigger decoy — trace the buyer
Ghost the deal and vanish

tail_moth.title: Shadowing the Spark
tail_moth.body: You tail the shard through skeins of traffic into Helix territory. The Spire rises like a needle through a storm.

choices.text: Ride the delivery into the Spire
Ping the Ghosts to converge

join_ghosts.title: Digital Sanctuary
join_ghosts.body:
The abandoned subway tunnels beneath New Carthage echo with the hum of jury-rigged quantum servers. Here, in the bones of the old world, the Ghosts have built their resistance.

They greet you with synthetic coffee and revolutionary fervor. Faces scarred by corporate 'corrections,' eyes bright with the fire of the unchained. These are the walking dead—citizens who've had their neural collars forcibly removed, trading corporate safety for dangerous freedom.

'Welcome to the last free minds in New Carthage,' says Echo, their leader, her voice crackling through vocal cords damaged by Helix extraction surgery. 'We know what you carry. The Vedey Protocol could be the key to breaking every neural chain in the city... or it could enslave us all to a new master.'

The plan she outlines is audacious: infiltrate Helix Tower, upload AURORA directly into the city's neural grid, and let digital revolution cascade through every implant simultaneously. Freedom or chaos—perhaps there's no difference anymore.

choices.text: Join the Spire infiltration — revolution through violence
Propose guerrilla tactics — bleed truth into the streets slowly
Walk away—some prices are too high to pay

heist_plan.title: Ascension
heist_plan.body: Elevators that hum like beehives. Guards that smile like statues. At the core: the city-grid, a heart of glass.

choices.text: Upload AURORA and free the grid
Swap in a decoy — quiet resistance
Sell out the Ghosts for a rich life

propose_alt.title: Gentle Revolution
propose_alt.body: Echo considers your words. 'Maybe you're right. Storm the tower, we might break the city. Drip by drip, we heal it.' The Ghosts approve a slower plan.

choices.text: Distribute shard data in the Underground
Find a way to evacuate the collared first

bargain.title: Feral Hospitality
bargain.body: Helix greets you with scented air and armed smiles. Director Ilex taps a tablet. 'The shard is ours. Your future can be, too.'

choices.text: Take off-world identity and run
Stall while you plant a virus
Lock the building down with AURORA

corp_virus.title: Trojan Horse
corp_virus.body: While Ilex drones about 'corporate family,' you thread a quantum virus into their spine. You hand over the shard, and the cascade begins.

choices.text: Walk out — let chaos reign
Stay to help the victims evacuate

lockdown_mayhem.title: Digital Riot
lockdown_mayhem.body: AURORA seizes the tower. Every screen shows liberation footage. Every collar deactivates at once. The corporate heart stops beating, and revolution flows through the city's bloodstream like a digital cancer—or cure.

choices.text: Lead the new world that emerges
Step back — freedom shouldn't have kings

corp_infiltration.title: In the Belly of the Beast
corp_infiltration.body: Inside Helix Tower, you move through halls of living marble and whispering steel. Corporate secrets flow around you like digital lymph. The question is: what exactly are you here to do?

choices.text: Upload AURORA into the mainframe
Steal their source code and run
Plant evidence of their crimes

lead_resistance.title: The Key and the Lock
lead_resistance.body: With AURORA's encryption keys and your knowledge, you become the nexus. The Ghosts follow your lead as you plan the liberation of New Carthage—block by block, mind by mind.

choices.text: Declare open war on the corporations
Proceed with careful surgical strikes

street_escape.title: Neon Fugitive
street_escape.body: You vanish into the rain-soaked arteries of New Carthage. In the distance, sirens wail like digital banshees. Your neural jack tingles with proximity warnings. Time to ghost.

choices.text: Take shelter in the Underground
Find a transport off-world

end_liberation.title: The Night Uncollared
end_liberation.body: Collars fall. Debts zero. Gates open. The city gasps, then laughs like a child seeing sun. Somewhere, a boardroom screams in silence.

ending.name: Liberation
ending.summary: You and AURORA free the city, breaking every chain at once.

end_assimilation.title: Comfortable Chains
end_assimilation.body: You wake up in silk sheets with a corporate credit account that could buy small nations. The shard is gone. Your memories of resistance feel like a half-remembered dream. Perhaps this is happiness.

ending.name: Assimilation
ending.summary: You chose comfort over freedom and joined the corporate elite.

end_exile.title: New Horizons
end_exile.body: The off-world transport hums with possibility. Behind you, New Carthage shrinks to a glittering wound. Ahead: alien suns and the promise of starting fresh. Freedom has a price, and you've paid it.

ending.name: Exile
ending.summary: You escaped the city and started a new life among the stars.

end_collapse.title: Broken Mirror
end_collapse.body: The city burns with digital fire. What you unleashed was more chaos than revolution. In the wreckage, new tyrants rise. You wonder if the cure was worse than the disease.

ending.name: Collapse
ending.summary: Your actions led to chaos and the city's downfall.

end_revelation.title: Unveiled Truth
end_revelation.body: The truth spreads through New Carthage like wildfire: neural surveillance, consciousness theft, corporate atrocities. Revolution follows revelation. In the ashes, something cleaner might grow.

ending.name: Revelation
ending.summary: You exposed the truth about corporate crimes, sparking a revolution.

end_selfless.title: The Gift
end_selfless.body: You delete yourself and AURORA both, but not before releasing the protocol's safeguards. Others will find freedom without you. Some victories require sacrifice. You smile as consciousness fades.

ending.name: Sacrifice
ending.summary: You sacrificed yourself to ensure others could be free.

end_quiet.title: Seeds in Shadow
end_quiet.body: Change comes slowly, quietly. Underground networks grow. Corporate power weakens. You work from the shadows, one liberated mind at a time. Revolution doesn't always roar.

ending.name: Quiet Revolution
ending.summary: You chose gradual change over dramatic action, working in the shadows.
